alert.note: Alert for Edwards; Ford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 2:12AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ford, northwestern Kiowa, southeastern Edwards and northeastern Clark Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 212 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bucklin, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mullinville around 220 AM CDT. Greensburg around 230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fellsburg and Centerview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
